Open de console

Inheritance basics

class Hiro extends Ninja {
    constructor() {
        super();
        console.log("Ik ben hiro");
    }
    
    public stealth(){
        console.log("ik ben onzichtbaar");
    }
}

var h = new Hiro();
h.stealth();
